name: my-organization/sso-provider-create
title: SSO Provider Creation Wizard
description: A multi-step wizard for creating SSO identity providers with support for multiple strategies including SAMLP, OIDC, ADFS, Okta, Google Workspace, Azure AD, and PingFederate.

files.content:
:root {
  --font-size-page-header: 2.25rem; /* text-4xl (For main page headers/titles) */
  --font-size-page-description: 0.875rem; /* text-sm (For page descriptions/subtitles) */
  --font-size-heading: 1.5rem; /* text-2xl */
  --font-size-title: 1.25rem; /* text-xl */
  --font-size-subtitle: 1.125rem; /* text-lg */
  --font-size-body: 1rem; /* text-base (For main body text size) */
  --font-size-paragraph: 0.875rem; /* text-sm (For general smaller paragraphs/details) */
  --font-size-label: 0.875rem; /* text-sm (Specifically for labels like FieldLabel) */
}
